content:
I'm happy to help! However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal relationships or interactions with you or your sister. I'm here to provide general information and assist with your queries.

That being said, the decision to call or text your sister depends on your personal preference and your relationship with her. Both methods can be effective, but it's essential to consider the context and tone you want to convey.

If you want to have a more personal and conversational tone, a phone call might be a better option. This way, you can catch up with your sister and discuss the pet carrier in a more relaxed manner.

On the other hand, if you're short on time or prefer a more concise approach, a text message can be a convenient way to remind your sister about the pet carrier. You can simply send a friendly reminder, and she can respond when she's available.

Ultimately, the choice between calling or texting depends on your communication style and your sister's preferences. You know her best, so choose the method that works best for both of you!
